Hi all,
Is there anyone able to help with an issue Iâ€™m having connecting a domain to HubSpot?
A domain is already connected and works fine. The problem is that it is connected as a subdomain (*www*.<http://domain.com|domain.com>) and now I cannot add another domain without the *www* without removing the old one.
I cannot remove the old one since the site is live and has hundreds of pages published already.

How can we use this library to write PHP in HubSpot? Based on this documentation and my understanding, we cannot write PHP in HubSpot with this library. It is meant for accessing HubSpot APIs from other languages to retrieve HubSpot data in different applications.. <@UJAPS2K4N> <@U01GW2U4WMA> Can you Please correct me if I'm wrong.

<@U047SNMFE4U>, you can use php for API but if you want to write themes, modules and other CMS stuff, you can use html, css, Vanilla js, react, Vue or try other frameworks. But always use hubl, makes your life easier
